name: Shots, Fired.
description:
"Shots, Fired." is a 64x64 cover shooter developed for LOWREZJAM2022.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

Tips:

Enemies will aim down the last position they saw you, move between cover while they are not looking to take them off guard.

Moving out of cover or shooting will cause your following shots to be inaccurate, you will need to wait a brief time to recover your aim.
